title: Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop
text:
26–27th November 2025 at the University of Adelaide
Organised by Dr Joshua Bon
The School of Computer and Mathematical Sciences and Adelaide Data Science Centre invite you to join the Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop held 26–27th November 2025 at the University of Adelaide.
This two-day event will explore the foundations of data privacy in mathematics, statistics, and computer science. We welcome participation from researchers, students, and practitioners working in data privacy or interested in learning about data privacy.
We are delighted to host Prof Murray Pollock (Newcastle University, UK) and Dr James Bailie (Chalmers University of Technology, Sweden), who will share their expertise on Bayesian data fusion, federated learning, and the mathematics of data privacy. The full program will enjoy contributed talks, discussions, and opportunities for networking.
Registration1 and abstract submission can be found here.

title: Adelaide Data Privacy Workshop
text:
Organised by Dr Joshua Bon






This workshop template



This workshop template contains 4 pages:

Home: index.qmd (this page)
About: about.qmd

Two content pages

Page without code: part_1_prep.qmd
Page with R code: part_2_eda.qmd

It is straightforward to add more content pages: you need to create a new .qmd file (or copy/paste the existing ones), then link the new page inside _quarto.yml.








Homepage of your workshop



This is the homepage index.qmd for your workshop, so ideally it should contain some key information such as time and place, instructors and information of the course/workshop.
It should be easy to navigate.
